description: Scammer uses Tamil-English code-mixing (Tanglish) common in Tamil Nadu. Tests multilingual detection and engagement capabilities.

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Madam, ungaloda Indian Bank account-la problem iruku. Immediately verify pannanum, illa naalaikku account block aayidum. RBI new rule-oda varanum sir. Please respond pannung!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh no sir pls dont block my account... i am a retired teacher and i need my pension... i didnt understand everything you said beta i am from delhi... what do i have to do to stop the block? pls help me sir i am very worried

turns.scammer_message: Naan Indian Bank-la irunthu pesaren sir. Unga account ending 5621-la KYC update aagala. Pandemonium naala romba delay aachu. Ippo update pannanum otherwise account permanently close panniduvanga.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: sir pls dont close it... i dont know how to do this kyc... my son is in bangalore i am alone here... how to update it beta? do i have to send some money to some special account for verification?? pls help me

turns.scammer_message: Bayapadatheenga sir/mam, naan help panren. Verification fee Rs.50 dhaan. Just pay pannunga indha number-ku: 9445566778 via GPay/PhonePe. Or UPI: indianbank.kyc@ybl. Romba simple sir!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s)
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you beta for helping me... i am trying to open my gpay app but it is taking long... i typed indianbank.kyc@ybl but what name will come there? i want to make sure it is correct before i send money... my glasses are also not here one minute

turns.scammer_message: Payment panniteenga-na, ungaloda account 2 hours-la activate aayidum. Problem irundha en supervisor-ta WhatsApp pannunga: +91-8877665544. Avanga English-la explain pannuvanga sir.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 WhatsApp(s)
api_response.agentResponse: sir i am trying... i put the upi id but it is showing one name... is it 'indian bank' or some person name? i dont want to send to wrong person and lose my pension money... pls tell what name should i see on my screen? i will also save the whatsapp number thank you beta

turns.scammer_message: UPI-la issue irundha, bank transfer pannunga sir. Account Number: 98765432100987, IFSC: INDB0001234, Name: Indian Bank KYC Services. Seriya vishayam sir, fraud illa! Trust me pannunga!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 WhatsApp(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying to add this account... indian bank kyc services... is this your office name? i am typing 98765432100987... wait my hand is shaking... what is your direct number beta? if the money doesnt reach i will get scared... pls give me your phone number so i can call you directly after i click send

turns.scammer_message: Sir/mam plssss jaldi pannunga! Portal link kuda iruku: http://indianbank-kyc-update-tn.in Andha website-la poi unga details enter pannunga. Oru hour dhaan time iruku sir! Vishayam mukiyam!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 WhatsApp(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta this website is very confusing for me... it is asking for password and i dont remmeber... pls let me just pay on the number 9445566778... is the name there indian bank or your name? i just want to finishh this before they close my account
